description: The WMO reports Earth’s atmospheric CO₂ reached 422.8 ppm in 2024 — the biggest annual rise ever recorded. Driven by fossil-fuel emissions, wildfires, and weakening carbon sinks, the surge intensifies global warming. Scientists warn that delayed emission cuts could entrench irreversible changes in weather, ecosystems, and sea levels.
title: Atmospheric Carbon Dioxide Soars to 424PPM, Marking Biggest Yearly Jump Ever

description: Astronomers detected a black hole 650 million light-years away devouring a star and then erupting twice with powerful flares months later. Observed by the Zwicky Transient Facility and tracked by ALMA and the VLA, this rare off-centre event hints at a rogue black hole cast out from its host galaxy.
title: Black Hole Tears Star Apart, Sends Out Powerful Flares Six Months Later

description: Two Russian cosmonauts, Sergey Ryzhikov and Alexey Zubritsky, carried out a six-hour spacewalk outside the ISS on Oct. 16, 2025. They installed the Ekran-M semiconductor experiment for growing ultra-thin materials in microgravity and safely jettisoned an outdated high-definition camera that will burn up upon re-entry.
title: Russian Cosmonauts Install Semiconductor Experiment During ISS Spacewalk

description: Vast Space’s Haven-1, a single-module orbital lab, will launch in 2026 via SpaceX’s Falcon 9. Designed for four astronauts on short missions, it features life-support systems tested with NASA and a domed observation window, marking a milestone in private space habitats.
title: Vast Space to Launch Haven-1, the World’s First Private Space Station in 2026

description: Former Assassin's Creed franchise boss, Marc-Alexis Coté, has said he did not leave Ubisoft and was instead asked to "step aside" by the company. According to the former Ubisoft executive, the company decided to hand over Assassin's Creed leadership to someone else as part of its new organisational structure.
title: Former Assassin's Creed Boss Says He Was Asked to 'Step Aside' by Ubisoft

description: Shakthi Thirumagan, starring Vijay Antony and directed by Arun Prabhu, was released in theatres on September 19th. Now the film is set for its digital debut on JioHotstar this month. While the movie didn't achieve much success at the box office, the cast was appreciated by both fans and critics. Apart from Vijay, Shakthi Thirumagan also stars Kannan, Krish Hassan, Vagai Chandrasekhar, and Cell Murugan.
title: Shakthi Thirumagan OTT Release: When, Where to Watch Vijay Antony-Starrer Action Thriller Online?

description: Anthropic has announced that Claude can now connect with Microsoft 365 apps, including Teams, Outlook, and OneDrive. Using its Model Context Protocol (MCP), the AI can pull data from emails, chats, and files to provide context-aware answers and summaries. Available to Team and Enterprise users, the integration also enables unified enterprise search across company tools.
title: Anthropic Connects Claude With Microsoft 365 Platforms, Can Pull Information From Outlook and Teams

description: Bhagwat Chapter 1: Raakshas is an Arshad Warsi and Jitendra Kumar starrer crime thriller movie that is soon landing on the digital screens. The movie follows inspector Bhagwat investigating a case of missing girls, while uncovering shocking truths. Bhagwat – Chapter 1: Raakshas will begin streaming from Oct 17th, 2025, only on Zee5. Viewers will require an active subscription to the streaming service to watch the film online.
title: Arshad Warsi's Bhagwat Chapter 1: Raakshas OTT Release: Everything You Need to Know About This Thriller

description: Borderlands 4 stays true to the series' identity, while expanding its looter shooter design across all aspects. The game ditches its linear roots for an open world, and that choice often stretches Borderlands 4 thin. But the open world also allows the series' trademark chaos to find a natural habitat.
title: Borderlands 4 Review: Guns Gone Wild

description: The Indian Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-In) has issued a notification asking Zoom for Windows, macOS, Android, and iOS users to download the latest available update of the app, as multiple vulnerabilities have been found in its particular version. The security flaws allow bad actors to gain unauthorised access to Zoom Rooms and get their hands on sensitive information, compromising the safety and integrity of the systems.
title: CERT-In Highlights Zoom Security Flaws That Could Let Hackers Access Meeting, Sensitive Information

description: Huawei Nova 14 Vitality Edition has been launched in China in three colourways. It houses a 5,500mAh battery and supports 66W fast charging. The phone features a dual rear camera unit, headlined by a 50-megapixel primary sensor. It offers IP65 dust and water resistance and boasts a 6.7-inch OLED display
title: Huawei Nova 14 Vitality Edition Launched With 5,500mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Selfie Camera: Price, Specifications

description: Huawei has launched the Nova Flip S in China as a more affordable version of the Nova Flip, featuring two new colours. It sports a 6.94-inch LTPO OLED main display, a 2.14-inch cover screen, and a 50-megapixel dual rear camera setup with a 32-megapixel selfie sensor. The phone packs a 4,400mAh battery with 66W fast charging and offers 256GB and 512GB storage variants. Likely powered by the Kirin 8000 chipset, it also includes a side-mounted fingerprint sensor for security.
title: Huawei Nova Flip S Launched With 4,400mAh Battery, 2.14-Inch Cover Screen: Price, Features

description: The iQOO 15, launching in China on October 20 and in India in November, has appeared on Thailand’s NBTC database with model number i2501, confirming 5G connectivity and Chinese manufacturing. Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 and Q3 gaming chip, it will feature a 6.85-inch 2K 144Hz LTPO “Everest” display, an 8K VC Dome cooling system, and a battery exceeding 7,000mAh. The flagship will also offer IP69 dust and water resistance and an in-display 3D ultrasonic fingerprint sensor.
title: iQOO 15 Spotted on NBTC Certification Website as Global Launch Nears

description: Between October 18 and 23, JioFinance is celebrating the festive season with its Jio Gold 24K Days offer. As part of this Diwali special offer, customers who buy digital gold worth Rs. 2,000 or more via the JioFinance or MyJio apps will get 2 percent additional gold. This additional gold will be added to their gold wallet within 72 hours of the transaction.
title: JioFinance Announces Limited-Time Jio Gold 24K Days Festive Offer Ahead of Diwali and Dhanteras

description: Nintendo is likely to comfortably surpass analysts’ estimates for sales of 17.6 million devices in the fiscal year ending March, let alone its own much lower public forecast, the people said, asking not to be named discussing private plans. Nintendo can be expected to sell roughly 20 million units of the Switch 2 this fiscal year.
title: Nintendo Aims to Make 25 Million Switch 2 Units by March 2026 to Set Gaming History

description: OnePlus has announced its Android 16-based operating system dubbed OxygenOS 16. It introduces a suite of artificial intelligence (AI) features linked to creativity, efficiency, and productivity. The update includes improved Plus Key and Mind Space features. As per company, there are comprehensive customisation capabilities, with fluid animations for the lock screen and app drawer.
title: OnePlus Announces OxygenOS 16 With AI Productivity Suite, Cross-Ecosystem Connectivity With Apple Watch

description: OnePlus Pad 2 will launch on October 27 in China alongside the OnePlus 15. It is confirmed to come in two colour options with MediaTek's Dimensity 9400+ chipset. It will have a 3K resolution display. The tablet will offer up to 16GB of RAM and maximum 512GB of storage. The company has started accepting pre-reservations for the tablet in China.
title: OnePlus Pad 2 With Dimensity 9400+ SoC, 3K Display Set to Launch in China Alongside OnePlus 15

description: OpenAI has made Sora 2 easier to access with two major updates. Users can now generate AI videos directly from the Sora website, not just the iOS app, although invites are still required. The company has also extended video length limits—up to 15 seconds for regular users and 25 seconds for Pro subscribers—while adding web-based storyboard editing for finer creative control.
title: OpenAI Is Now Letting Users Generate Sora 2 Videos on the Web, Increases Duration

description: Red Magic 11 Pro and Red Magic 11 Pro+ were launched in China on Friday by the Chinese tech firm. The Red Magic 11 Pro+ is powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, coupled with up to 24GB of RAM and up to 1TB of internal storage. The handsets pack an 8,000mAh battery with support for 120W wired and 80W wireless fast charging. The Pro+ model also ships with transparent back colour options. The Red Magic 11 Pro series is available in China via the company’s website.
title: Red Magic 11 Pro Series Launched With Snapdragon Elite Gen 5, Liquid Cooling: Price, Specifications

description: Redmi’s latest teaser reveals the K90 Pro Max will launch in China on October 23, featuring a dual-tone textured denim blue finish with a silver middle frame and camera island, along with a Flowing Gold White variant. The phone has a centrally placed punch-hole front camera, slim bezels, and a rectangular rear camera module with a periscope lens and LED flash. A “Sound by Bose” speaker indicates a Redmi-Bose collaboration. It is expected to run on Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 and support 100W wired fast charging.
title: Redmi K90 Pro Max Design Revealed; Will Feature Denim-Textured Rear Panel, Bose-Tuned Speakers

description: The Fantastic Four: First Steps is a fast-paced, visually stunning superhero adventure film that showcases Marvel's first family with heart and style. Reports suggest that The Fantastic Four: First Steps could make its OTT debut in October, based on the pattern of other MCU arrivals. However, an official confirmation is yet to arrive. The film stars Pedro Pascal as Reed Richards and Vanessa Kirby as Sue Storm.
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps Reportedly Set for OTT Debut Soon: All You Need to Know

description: Vivo has revealed the release schedule for Android 16-based OriginOS 6 in India. The Chinese tech firm will begin rolling out the update in early November, and the Vivo X200 series handsets will be among the first phones to receive it. The Vivo X Fold 5 will also be updated in November, along with the Vivo V60. The new Android 16-based OriginOS 6 update brings various redesigned elements to Vivo phones. The company recently unveiled its Vivo X300 lineup, which ships with OriginOS 6.
title: Vivo Confirms OriginOS 6 Update Rollout Schedule in India: Check Full Release Timeline

description: EA announced Thursday that Battlefield 6 had sold seven million copies in three days of launch. The company called the game a "record-breaking success" and said it was the “biggest launch in franchise history”. Battlefield 6 launched on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series S/X on October 10.
title: EA Says Battlefield 6 Is the Biggest Launch in Franchise History, Confirms 7 Million Unit Sales Milestone

description: Xiaomi Group President Lu Weibing reportedly confirmed that future Xiaomi smartphones will continue to feature the Dynamic Back Display. This feature, which was introduced in the Xiaomi 17 Pro series, shows real-time notifications and reminders. Xiaomi is also said to be ramping up its R&D investment for the feature.
title: Xiaomi 17 Pro Series Successors to Feature Dynamic Rear Display With Additional Functionality: Report

description: Kantara: A Legend – Chapter 1 is a cinematic journey into the origins of the Buta Kola ritual in Tulu Nadu. Berme’s journey intertwines action, devotion, and sacrifice, supported by Kanakavathi and King Kulasekhara. The film is going to stream on Amazon Prime Video from October 30, 2025. The Hindi dubbed version is coming soon.
title: Kantara: A Legend Chapter-1 Lands on Amazon Prime Video Soon: Know When, Where to Watch Action-Thriller Online

description: Microsoft has rolled out its biggest AI update to Windows 11, integrating Copilot deeply into the operating system. The update removes the need for dedicated AI PCs, making every compatible Windows 11 device capable of running AI-powered features through a server-based version of Copilot. The assistant can now see, understand, and act across the system, marking a major step towards an agentic Windows OS.
title: Windows 11 Gets Its Biggest AI Update as Copilot Becomes Fully Integrated

description: Motorola launched the Moto G86 Power 5G in India in July, and its upcoming G67 Power 5G has been spotted on Geekbench, hinting at an imminent release. The G67 Power 5G scored 1,022 in the single-core test and 2,917 in the multi-core test, indicating capable performance for everyday use and moderate multitasking. The smartphone is expected to feature a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset with Adreno 710 GPU, 8GB of RAM, and run Android 15-based Hello UI.
title: Motorola G67 Power 5G Visits Geekbench With Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 SoC

description: iQOO Neo 11 is expected to be launched in China soon. While its launch date remains under wraps, the Vivo sub-brand has begun teasing the upcoming handset via its social media handles. Following the first look at the side profile of the iQOO Neo 11, its rear panel has now been revealed. As per the company, the phone will come with a suspended glass design and a metal middle frame having a matte finish.
title: iQOO Neo 11 Design Teased Again With Satin AG Glass, Matte-Finish Middle Frame

description: Apple is working on a MacBook Pro model with an OLED display, which could launch by late 2026 or early 2027, a recent report had highlighted. Now, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman has revealed that the same model will also sport a touchscreen, reinforced hinges, and redesigned elements. It is said to be powered by Apple's M6 chip. The company is also said to be working on MacBook Pro iterations with the M5 Pro and M5 Max chips, which could debut by early 2026. This comes days after Apple unveiled its latest MacBook Pro with the M5 chip.
title: Apple Reportedly Plans to Launch MacBook Pro With OLED Touchscreen by Early 2027

description: Oppo Find X9 series is confirmed to launch in India soon, the Chinese tech firm announced on Friday. While the company has not revealed the exact launch date, a recent report revealed that the Find X9 and Find X9 Pro could arrive in India as soon as November 18. Oppo's flagship smartphone lineup was unveiled in China on Thursday, along with the Pad 5 and Watch S. The series is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 9500 SoC and features a Hasselblad-tuned camera setup.
title: Oppo Find X9 Series India Launch, Colourways Confirmed After Company Reveals Global Launch Date

description: OnePlus teased the colour options and design of the OnePlus 15 through the Chinese social media platform Weibo. It will be available in three shades. The upcoming phone is confirmed to run on Qualcomm's new flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. It will have an OLED display with a 165Hz refresh rate.
title: OnePlus 15 Colour Options, Design Teased Ahead of October 27 Launch

description: Lava’s Probuds has announced the “Diwali Zero-Risk Muhurat Sale,” starting October 21 at 1:15 PM IST, offering 100 units of the Probuds Aria 911 for Rs. 21 on a first-come, first-served basis. The brand is also introducing India’s first 30-day trial program with a full refund option under its “Money Back Challenge.” Additionally, a Mega Diwali Contest running from October 16 to October 20 offers participants a chance to win Probuds audio devices, with winners to be announced on October 22.
title: Lava Probuds Aria 911 Mega Flash Sale: How to Get Lava's TWS Earbuds for Rs 21 on October 21

description: OnePlus on Friday announced the launch date of its upcoming flagship, the OnePlus 15, clearing up the confusion raised yesterday. The OnePlus handset is confirmed to debut in China at the end of October. As per the company, it will be accompanied by another high-performance OnePlus smartphone, the OnePlus Ace 6. While specifications remain under wraps, the handsets have been listed on the e-commerce platforms in China and are available for pre-reservation.
title: OnePlus 15 China Launch Date Announced; to Debut Alongside OnePlus Ace 6

description: OnePlus Ace 6 is confirmed to be launched in at the end of October alongside the flagship OnePlus 15. Although the brand has remained pretty tight-lipped on the upcoming Ace series handset so far, it has now shared a couple of teasers which provide a glimpse of the design and colourways of the OnePlus Ace 6. It is teased to be offered in three colour options, with one of them sporting the ACE branding at the back.
title: OnePlus Ace 6 Design, Colourways Teased Ahead of China Launch on October 27

description: The auspicious day of Dhanteras is here, and it marks the start of the festive season in India. It is almost customary to commemorate this occasion by purchasing metals like gold and silver as a mark of good fortune. Instead of making the purchases physically, you can buy digital gold as a more convenient means of making the investment. Here are five apps that you can use to purchase digital gold this Dhanteras.
title: 5 Apps You Can Use to Buy Digital Gold This Dhanteras

description: Scientists recreated Martian gullies in a lab and found they were carved by exploding CO₂ ice blocks, not flowing water. The discovery explains how these trenches form naturally and offers new insight into Mars’ ever-changing landscape
title: Exploding Dry Ice May Explain Mars’ Puzzling Dune Patterns, Study Finds

description: The OTT platforms are ready with the fresh releases, where some of the most anticipated movies will buzz your digital screens. Some of the releases include How to Train Your Dragon. Mirage, Our Fault, and more.
title: Top OTT Releases of the Week (Oct 13th - Oct 19th): How To Train Your Dragon, Kishkindhapuri,  How To Train Your Dragon, and More
